data.comment: Luton kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Sonny Bradley (Luton) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 16, At John Smith's Stadium, Josh Koroma has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through George Moncur.
Glen Rea (Luton) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 40, Martin Cranie (Luton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Oliver Langford blows to end the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Huddersfield kick-off.
In the minute 60, Goal! Carel Eiting (Huddersfield) levels the score at 1-1 with a header.
James Bree is on a sub for George Moncur for Luton.
Christopher Schindler is replacing Adama Diakhaby for the home team.
In the minute 73, Luton make their second substitution with Kazenga LuaLua replacing Harry Cornick.
The away team replace Luke Berry with Ryan Tunnicliffe.
Danny Ward is on a sub for Josh Koroma for Huddersfield.
In the minute 84, Luton's James Collins has been booked in Huddersfield.
Kazenga LuaLua is booked for the away team.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
The home team replace Pipa with Demeaco Duhaney.
